quote: When I see the promotion of nighttime street lighting to the masses, I realize the great level of incompetence that is present in governments, human health and the biological effects of light.
quote_letters: WHEN I SEE THE PROMOTION OF NIGHTTIME STREET LIGHTING TO THE MASSES I REALIZE THE GREAT LEVEL OF INCOMPETENCE THAT IS PRESENT IN GOVERNMENTS HUMAN HEALTH AND THE BIOLOGICAL EFFECTS OF LIGHT
